name: Space Glitcher
description:
Fly through space in your own personal fighter ship and blast your way through waves of enemies to reach the BOSS!

You can become invincible for a second by GLITCHING allowing you to take even the strongest attacks head on!

Controls:

***Despite what it says in-game using a controller does not work when playing on itch for some reason.

[WASD] to move

[Left Click] or [Left Ctrl] to shoot

[Space] to glitch

Let me know if you manage to beat the BOSS!

This game was made in 72 hours for the Wowie Game Jam 2.0.

The laser sound effects were made by dklon. https://opengameart.org/content/laser-fire

The explosion animation was made by J-Robot. https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-explosion-12-frames

All other assets used are in the public domain.
